attributes.title: Heritage Grazers
attributes.description:
Created on May 2, 2011 by mkc330 on Sourcemap.org:

Where Bob Comis orders his piglets. He receives the pigs when they are 6-8 weeks old. Vermont Heritage Grazers supplies breeds with no genetic modification; breeds with old genetics, which is important for diversity and the health of the hogs.
